rrpss

Class Order

  • Object
    • Order
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Order
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Stores all important information of an order created for a customer. This class stores the ID, date and time of the Order object creation, the Staff object who created the Order, and the most important thing is the menu item the customer ordered.

    This class implements the Serializable interface as this object may be saved into a ".ser" file during the application execution.

    Author:
    Edwin Candinegara
    See Also:
    Serializable, Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • id

        private int id
        Distinguish one object with another. This attribute is assigned in createOrder(Calendar, Staff) from OrderManager class.

      • dateTime

        private Calendar dateTime
        Specify when this object is created. This attribute is assigned in createOrder(Calendar, Staff) from OrderManager class.

      • status

        private String status
        Specify the status of this object.

        There are 2 type of status.

        • Active
        • Closed

      • staff

        private Staff staff
        Specify the Staff who created this Order object.

      • alaCartes

        private HashMap<AlaCarte,Integer> alaCartes
        A HashMap used to store all AlaCarte objects ordered by the customer. The key is the AlaCarte object and the value associated is the quantity.

      • setPackages

        private HashMap<SetPackage,Integer> setPackages
        A HashMap used to store all SetPackage objects ordered by the customer. The key is the SetPackage object and the value associated is the quantity.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Order

        public Order(int id,
     Calendar dateTime,
     Staff staff)
        Constructs an Order object with ID, date and time when it is made, and Staff object indicating who created this object.

        When an object is created, the status is set to "Active" automatically. The Vector alaCartes and setPackages are initialized without any element.

        Parameters:
        id - Distinguish one object with another
        dateTime - Indicate when this object is created
        staff - Indicate who created this object

    • Method Detail

      • setId

        public void setId(int id)
        Set the id attribute with the specified value.
        Parameters:
        id - An integer used to set the id attribute

      • setStatus

        public void setStatus(String status)
        Set the status attribute to the specified String argument.
        Parameters:
        status - String used to set the status attribute (must be "Active" or "Closed")

      • addAlaCarte

        public void addAlaCarte(AlaCarte alaCarte,
               int quantity)
        Add an AlaCarte object ordered by the customer to the attribute alaCartes.

        The method first checks whether the specified AlaCarte object has already been inside the alaCartes attribute.
        If it is, then this method only update the quantity of that particular AlaCarte object If it is not, then this method create a new entry in alaCartes attribute with the specified quantity.

        Parameters:
        alaCarte - An AlaCarte object which is added to alaCartes
        quantity - An integer indicating the quantity of the ordered item (must be a positive integer)

      • getAlaCarteByItemId

        private AlaCarte getAlaCarteByItemId(int itemId)
        Return AlaCarte object with the specified ID. If no such AlaCarte object is found, this method returns null.
        Parameters:
        itemId - The ID of an AlaCarte object that is looked for (should be an ID of an existing AlaCarte object)
        Returns:
        AlaCarte object with the specified ID or null if no such object is found.

      • removeAlaCarteByItemId

        public int removeAlaCarteByItemId(int itemId)
        Remove an AlaCarte object with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        itemId - The ID of the AlaCarte object to be removed (should be an ID of an existing AlaCarte object)
        Returns:
        1 if the targeted AlaCarte object is successfully removed or -1 otherwise

      • getAlaCartes

        public HashMap<AlaCarte,Integer> getAlaCartes()
        Returns the AlaCarte objects.
        Returns:
        The AlaCarte objects

      • addSetPackage

        public void addSetPackage(SetPackage setPackage,
                 int quantity)
        Add an SetPackage object ordered by the customer to the attribute setPackages.

        The method first checks whether the specified SetPackage object has already been inside the setPackages attribute.
        If it is, then this method only update the quantity of that particular SetPackage object If it is not, then this method create a new entry in setPackages attribute with the specified quantity.

        Parameters:
        setPackage - An SetPackage object which is added to setPackages
        quantity - An integer indicating the quantity of the ordered item (must be a positive integer)

      • getSetPackageByItemId

        private SetPackage getSetPackageByItemId(int itemId)
        Return SetPackage object with the specified ID. If no such SetPackage object is found, this method returns null.
        Parameters:
        itemId - The ID of an SetPackage object that is looked for (should be an ID of an existing SetPackage object)
        Returns:
        SetPackage object with the specified ID or null if no such object is found.

      • removeSetPackageByItemId

        public int removeSetPackageByItemId(int itemId)
        Remove an SetPackage object with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        itemId - (should be an ID of an existing SetPackage object)
        Returns:
        1 if the targeted AlaCarte object is successfully removed or -1 otherwise

      • printOrder

        public void printOrder()
        Print the breakdown of items of this Order object. This method prints all Ala Carte and Set Package items details including the price and the quantity.
